instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: Anyone have a need for non-U.S. keyboards?
threads.message: I have about 12 Euro and Asian top cases for Airs and Pros that I have no use for and rather than take them to the recycling center where I know they'll never get used I can send them to someone if you have a need. I'm not worried about getting any money for them, I just want them to go to someone maybe in New York or somewhere else with a little more international influence than where I am. I'm pretty sure they all work. May have a missing BIL. Trackpads have been pulled. Not sticky. I can't send them outside of the U.S. but let me know if you live in the U.S. and have a need for them.

threads.title: Anyone have a need for non-U.S. keyboards?
threads.message: How many Airs are there? Are they 2013+ models?

threads.title: Anyone have a need for non-U.S. keyboards?
threads.message: Mainly 2011/2012 13" Pro top cases. A Japanese 2014 13" Air, a Euro 2013 13" Air, Euro 2011 11" Air.
